src:
Arsenal-seieren glapp p√• overtid
Shkodran Mustafi s√• ut til √• bli matchvinner for Arsenal mot Vit√≥ria Guimar√£es i Europa League, men p√• overtid glapp det igjen for London-klubben.
06 Nov 2019, 18:14 by NTB

VITORIA GUIMARAES - ARSENAL 1‚Äì1

Det sto igjen ti minutter av kampen da Mustafi stanget inn Pepes skrudde frispark og ordnet ledelse 1-0. Bruno Duarte s√∏rget for ny Arsenal-nedtur da han brassesparket inn utligningen et stykke inn i overtiden.
Uavgjort betyr at Arsenal avga sine f√∏rste poeng hittil i turneringen. Laget hadde vunnet alle sine tre tidligere kamper og snudde 1-2 til 3-2-seier p√• hjemmebane mot Vit√≥ria. Da scoret Gabriel Martinelli ett og Nicolas P√©p√© to.

Arsenal-stjerne fratatt kapteinsbindet

1-1 for Vit√≥ria betyr at laget tok sitt f√∏rste poeng i gruppespillet.
Det har v√¶rt mye uro i Arsenal den siste tiden, og det blir neppe bedre etter det som skjedde i Portugal. Laget er i ferd med √• miste viktig terreng til de fire beste i Premier League, og spillet har v√¶rt alt annet enn tilfredsstillende. Fansen murrer, og det ble ikke bedre av at Granit Xhaka hisset seg opp over supporterne da han ble byttet ut for en tid tilbake.


Vitorias Bruno Duarte ligger langflat og brassesparker inn 1-1-scoringen.üì∑ Foto: Luis Vieira / AP / NTB scanpix.

Strippet
Hendelsen gjorde at sveitseren ble fratatt kapteinsbindet, og han var heller ikke med i torsdagens tropp.
Der fantes heller ikke menn som Mesut √ñzil, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, David Luiz og Callum Chambers.
Arsenal har framst√•tt som direkte kjedelig i de fleste seriekampene denne sesongen, og det sp√∏rs om det heller ikke blir mer arbeidsro for manager Unai Emery etter det som skjedde i kampen mot Vit√≥ria.
Arsenal hadde ballen i over 60 prosent av tiden f√∏r pause, men det var hjemmelaget som skapte de farligste sjansene. Arsenal var heldig da Vit√≥rias Pepe langet i vei et langskudd fra 25 meter som smalt i metallet etter ni minutters spill.
Like etterp√• gjorde Emiliano Mart√≠nez to sterke redninger innledningsvis i regnv√¶ret, og det var kun argentinerens gode spill som holdt London-laget inne i kampen.

Arsenal-kapteinen i tr√∏bbel etter denne gesten. TV-eksperten mener han hadde rett til √• reagere.



Mustafi stanget inn 1‚Äì0 for Arsenal.üì∑ PAUL CHILDS / Reuters

Arsenal-m√∏nster
Selv om Arsenal hadde ballen mest var de sv√¶rt tannl√∏se da de n√¶rmet seg hjemmelagets m√•l. Vit√≥rias keeper ble ikke tvunget til √• gj√∏re en eneste redning de f√∏rste 45 minuttene. Det har tegnet seg et m√∏nster der Arsenal har framst√•tt n√¶rmest ufarlig i angrep til n√• denne sesongen.
I 1. omgang hadde Arsenal 245 mot 111 vellykkede pasninger, men Vitoria vant likevel skuddstatistikken 10-1.
Det sier sitt om hvem som var det giftigste laget f√∏r pause.
I 2. omgang var Arsenal hakket bedre enn i de f√∏rste 45 minuttene, men de var heldige som kunne ta ledelsen med ti minutter igjen.
Da s√• det ut til √• bli en litt opptur Unai Emerys utvalgte, men den oppturen ble kvalt p√• overtid.
text:
The Arsenal victory was lost in overtime
Shkodran Mustafi looked to be the match winner for Arsenal against Vit√≥ria Guimar√£es in the Europa League, but in overtime it missed again for the London club.
06 Nov 2019, 18:14 by NTB

VITORIA GUIMARAES - ARSENAL 1‚Äì1

There was another ten minutes left of the game when Mustafi steered Pepe's free-kick and arranged the lead 1-0. Bruno Duarte caused a new Arsenal downturn as he brass kicked the equalizer a bit into overtime.
A draw means Arsenal scored their first points so far in the tournament. The team had won all three of their previous matches and turned 1-2 in the home win against Vit√≥ria. Then Gabriel Martinelli scored one and Nicolas P√©p√© two.

Arsenal star deprived of the captain's tie

1-1 for Vit√≥ria means the team took its first point in the group stage.
There has been a lot of unrest in Arsenal lately, and things are hardly improving after what happened in Portugal. The team is losing important ground to the top four in the Premier League, and the game has been anything but satisfactory. The fans murmured, and it was not better that Granit Xhaka got excited about the fans when he was replaced for a while.


Vitoria's Bruno Duarte lies flat and brass kicks into the 1-1 score.üì∑ Photo: Luis Vieira / AP / NTB scanpix.

stripped
The incident caused the Swiss to be removed from the captain's band, and he was not included in Thursday's squad.
There were also no men like Mesut √ñzil, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, David Luiz and Callum Chambers.
Arsenal have looked dull in most of the series matches this season, and it is asked whether there will be no more restlessness for manager Unai Emery after what happened in the match against Vit√≥ria.
Arsenal had the ball for over 60 percent of the time before the break, but it was the home team that created the most dangerous chances. Arsenal were lucky when Vit√≥rias Pepe fired a 25-yard long shot that narrowed the metal after nine minutes of play.
Shortly afterwards, Emiliano Mart√≠nez made two strong saves initially in the rain, and it was only the Argentine's good play that kept the London team inside the game.

The Arsenal captain in trouble after this gesture. The TV expert thinks he was right to respond.



Mustafi trailed 1‚Äì0 for Arsenal.üì∑ PAUL CHILDS / Reuters

Arsenal pattern
Although Arsenal had the ball the most they were very toothless as they approached the home team's goal. Vit√≥ria's keeper was not forced to make a single save for the first 45 minutes. It has emerged as a pattern in which Arsenal have appeared almost harmless in strikes so far this season.
In the first half, Arsenal had 245 against 111 successful passes, but Vitoria still won the shot statistics 10-1.
It says its about who was the most toxic team before the break.
In the second half Arsenal were better than the first 45 minutes, but they were lucky to take the lead with ten minutes left.
Then it seemed to be a little upset Unai Emery's selected, but that upturn was stifled overtime.
